1.0.name: wordpress/amw-chat
1.0.description:
A small live chat module that allows members/guests to chat with each other as they browse your site. Includes public chat as well as private messaging. Discussions carry across pages as users browse your site.

Uses: Jquery & Jquery UI SQL Database

For more information visit and help visit: http://alexmakeswebsites.com/integrate-ajax-chat-into-your-site-using-phpmysql/
